name: RADARS (Raw Data for Research and Sciences)
description: The MOSTI Raw Data for Research and Sciences (RADARS) was developed by the Ministry of Science, Technology & Innovation (MOSTI) through the Malaysian Science and Technology Information Centre (MASTIC) in 2019. The majority of the data listed in RADARS is freely available for the public, provided that the user complies with all the terms and conditions set by the data owner. There is also a small number of limited data such as the latest satellite images, radar and satellite data where users need to apply directly to the relevant data owner and may be charged according to the specification of the requested data.
owner_name: Ministry of Science, Technology & Innovation (MOSTI) / MASTIC
